contributionDescription: I'm an active Optimism user who have done many transactions on OP network. I delegated my OP too and participated in OP grants as well. I will keep on exploring Optimism for its efficiency, security, and support the development & adoption of Optimism.

contributionLinks.description: All of my activities on OP network.

impactDescription: I will give a positive impact on optimism community. I believe a good community needs to maintain a positive and strong environment. I have my own work community also that I will introduce Optimism to. That way, optimism will always have a strong community and active users continously.
